text:
Downloaded and installed Apache 2.0.44 
Set it up as a reverse proxy everything working fine except one thing. 
Some of my proxyed application required back slash "\" == "%5C" character 
in the URL. It looks like since version 2.0.40 after fixing security 
vulnerability (CAN-2002-0661) Apache is not reverse proxying any request 
that contain this symbol.
creator: sas_gorlenko@hotmail.com

text:
This appears to be an instance of bug#15207.
Fixing it is work-in-progress - see the dev mailinglists.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 15207 ***
creator: nick@webthing.com
